strings.string: Fetch Page Size (the number of items to present on a page of results)
Guidebox API Key (please supply your own if possible)
fanart.tv API Key (please supply your own if possible)
TheTVDB API Key (please supply your own if possible)
Favorites (these are modified in the addon context menu - don't edit these here)
Favorite Channels (comma separated list of channel IDs)
Favorite Shows (comma separated list of show IDs)
